thread.title: Clinton confidant expresses regret over handling of e-mail issue
thread.title_full: Clinton confidant expresses regret over handling of e-mail issue - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Clinton confidant expresses regret over handling of e-mail issue
text: Cheryl D. Mills, who served as Hillary Rodham Clinton’s chief of staff while she was secretary of state, said she regrets not thinking more closely about how her boss would handle her e-mail as Clinton was entering the cabinet in 2009. Mills, a longtime adviser to Clinton who also serves as one of her personal […] ...
